layout.description: Describes the entire layout for the page or component

content.description: An entire dataset of IDs to content that should be displayed in the layout

^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$.description: Text or URL to display in HTML layout

type.description: Name of the Element template or HTML tag name

domProps.description: DOM properties and values for the element. Does NOT include javascript interactions.

props.description: Custom template properties to pass to the element
